projects.title: Software developer
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: To-do List

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my learnership. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that my skills, experiences and projects. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
